thmuggleton.model

Interface Frame

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractFrame, FrameImpl, LastFrameImpl

    public interface Frame
    Defines a read-only interface to interact with model objects representing frames.
    Author:
    Thomas Muggleton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int LAST_FRAME
      Constant for the number of possible shots in a regular frame.
      static int REGULAR_FRAME
      Constant for the number of possible shots in a regular frame.
      static int SCORE_UNSET
      Constant indicating that the score in this frame has not yet been set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addChangeListener(ChangeListener listener)
      Adds a change listener to this Frame which will be informed of change events.
      int[] getScores()
      Returns the scores for each shot in the frame.
      int getTotal()
      Returns the total score for the frame.
      boolean isSpare()
      Returns true if a spare was scored for this frame.
      boolean isStrike()
      Returns true if a strike was scored for this frame.
